name: spaden
description: The FINN.no front-end CSS framework built on top of OOCSS

scripts.maven:install: npm run package && node maven install
scripts.maven:snapshot: npm run package && node maven snapshot
scripts.maven:deploy: npm run package && node maven deploy
scripts.push-package-publish: git push --follow-tags && npm run package && npm publish --registry 'https://registry.npmjs.org' && npm run maven:deploy
scripts.release:patch: npm version patch && npm run push-package-publish
scripts.release:minor: npm version minor && npm run push-package-publish
scripts.release:major: npm version major && npm run push-package-publish
